title: Medical Director
description: We are seeking an experienced Medical Director to oversee and lead our medical team.
duties: Responding to patients’ medical problems by referring to their history, carrying out diagnosis, treatment, counseling, and referral, where necessary.
Perform Integrative Wellness assessments and treatments
Perform Medical Aesthetic procedures e.g., Botox and PRP injections
Develop relationships with pharmacies and labs
Order and prescribe patient prescriptions
Upsell the clinic’s procedures and products to patients
Ordering lab tests and interpreting the test results
Always maintain confidentiality and impartiality
Collecting, recording, and maintaining sensitive patient information such as examination results, medical history, and reports
Explaining procedures or prescribed treatments to patients
Discussing and evaluating new pharmaceutical products with pharmaceutical representatives
Keeping up to date with medical developments, treatment, and medication

title: Aesthetics MD
description: Exciting opportunity for an Aesthetics MD to join our team. Specialize in cosmetic and aesthetic procedures...
duties: Develop relationships with pharmacies and labs
Order and prescribe patient prescriptions
Create and maintain clinic protocols
Increase patient volume
Upsell the clinic’s procedures and products to patients
Always maintain confidentiality and impartiality
Collecting, recording, and maintaining sensitive patient information such as examination results, medical history, and reports
Liaising with medical professionals in the community and hospitals
Promoting health education in conjunction with other health professionals
Meeting targets set by the government for specified treatments
Discussing and evaluating new pharmaceutical products with pharmaceutical representatives
Keeping up to date with medical developments, treatment, and medication

title: Nurse Practitioner (NP)
description: We are looking for a dedicated and skilled Nurse Practitioner to provide high-quality patient care...
duties: Order and study diagnostic test
Diagnose health conditions and illnesses
Prescribe medication
Maintain accurate medical records and schedules
Inform patient about their health conditions and promote good health practices
Develop and implement treatment plans for patients assigned within the scope of practice
Refers patients to overseeing physician for consultation or to specialized health resources for treatment
Perform physical examinations and preventive health measures within prescribed guidelines and instructions
Educates and coaches clinical staff on best practices and assists center managers in facilitating program management

title: Registered Nurse (RN)
description: We are seeking an experienced Registered Nurse. Provide compassionate care and support to our patients...
duties: Schedule appointments
Obtain blood samples
Perform data entry
Measure and record vital signs
Clean exam rooms
Answer phone calls
Ability to communicate effectively with patients and fellow employees
Recording patient vital signs, documenting physicians notes and changes in medical condition
Prepping exam rooms for clinical procedure and assisting
Manage inventory of clinic supplies and coordinated reordering
Obtains authorization for all necessary medical office tests/procedures
Answer patient questions and provide assistance when necessary

title: Medical Assistant (MA)
description: responsibilities for assisting doctors and nurses in providing care to their patients.
duties: Schedule appointments
Obtain blood samples
Perform data entry
Measure and record vital signs

Obtains authorization for all necessary medical office tests/procedures
Answer patient questions and provide assistance when necessary

title: Medical receptionist (MR)
description: greeting and checking in patients, answering questions, processing forms, and scheduling appointments along with helping to manage social medical portals and some back office assistance.
duties: Answer and direct phones calls using proper phone etiquette
Greet and assist visitors in a professional and friendly manner
Coordinate and schedule appointments, meetings, and events
Maintain office supplies and inventory
Assist with tasks such as filing, data entry, and document preparation
Coordinate projects and ensure timely completing
Provide administrative support to staff members as needed
Collecting co-pays and balances
Scanning in new patient paperwork, release forms, and insurance cards
